description: A React custom hook that determines if the current viewport width qualifies as 'desktop' based on a minimum width threshold (default 1024 pixels). It listens for window resize events to update its value dynamically.

methods.name: useIsDesktop(minWidth = 1024)
methods.description: A React hook that returns a boolean indicating whether the current viewport width is greater than or equal to the specified minimum width. It updates on window resize events.
